author: Will McClelland
description:
For those who can remember introductory English classes, Crypt of the Moon Spider is like if Charlotte Gilman’s The Yellow Wallpaper took place on the moon—with psychic spiders, spider-silk lobotomies and a repressed woman’s eight-legged revenge. In this first novella of what will be The Lunar Gothic Trilogy, Nathan Ballingrud has gifted us with a […]

The post REVIEW: Crypt of the Moon Spider by Nathan Ballingrud appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Crypt of the Moon Spider by Nathan Ballingrud
